entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
